General.Name: Thanh Cong Textile Garment Investment Trading JSC
General.Description: Thanh Cong Textile Garment Investment Trading Joint Stock Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in textile and garment manufacturing, fashion retail, real estate, and trademarks business in Vietnam and internationally. The company operates through Garment and textile, Healthcare services, and Other segments. It manufactures and trades in cotton, fibers, garments, footwear, machineries and equipment, spare parts, raw materials, chemicals, and dyes, as well as provides packaging services for garment and textile industry; and trades in buildings and merchandise centers. The company is also involved in investment, building, trading, assembly, repair, and budgeting estimates for civil and construction works, as well as for infrastructure of industrial parks and tourist areas; leasing office buildings, factories, freight yard, machinery, and equipment; installation and repair of machinery and equipment; and acting as an agent for goods trading and consignment. In addition, it provides medical services; trades in medical products and equipment; and e-commerce services. The company was formerly known as Thanh Cong Textile Garment Joint Stock Company and changed its name to Thanh Cong Textile Garment Investment Trading Joint Stock Company in May 2008. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
